name: RiseHero
description: "RiseHero is a decentralized NFT game for hero battle.Players can keep fighting and getting stronger in the game. Also get rewards by mining and trading. Players can collect and have a chance to obtain hero NFTs with high-quality attributes. NFT Yield Mining allows NFT collections automatically mining to bring players income and increase the value of NFT. The battlefield of RiseHero is waiting for Hero to take risks. Heroes need to upgrade through levels and defeat the BOSS to win rewards."
